医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
伦敦大学研究人员获得 360 万美元用于研究砷暴露在导致健康问题中的作用路易斯维尔大学的研究人员获得了 360 万美元的新拨款，用于研究砷暴露在导致癌症和其他重大健康问题中的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240820/UofL-researchers-receive-2436-million-to-study-the-role-of-arsenic-exposure-in-causing-health-problems.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240820/UofL-researchers-receive-2436-million-to-study-the-role-of-arsenic-exposure-in-causing-health-problems.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=866f918d-e03b-43e2-98b7-379f17f518b8 Tue, 20 Aug 2024 15:25:18 -0400 UofL researchers receive $3.6 million to study the role of arsenic exposure in causing health problems
AI可以有效排除胸部X光检查中的病理根据美国放射学会杂志《放射学》今天发表的一项研究，在标签外使用的商业人工智能 (AI) 工具可以有效排除病理，并且胸部 X 光检查的严重漏检率与放射科医生相同或更低。北美（RSNA）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240820/AI-can- effectively-exclude-pathology-in-chest-X-rays.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240820/AI-can- effectively-exclude-pathology-in-chest-X-rays.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ab12e03b-7a06-453d-830d-4892546221fd Tue, 20 Aug 2024 15:20:58 -0400 AI can effectively exclude pathology in chest X-rays
简化的吸烟测试被证明可以可靠地预测癌症患者的戒烟情况近 6000 名患有癌症的吸烟者的数据表明，预测谁会戒烟可能比之前想象的更容易。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240820/Simplified-smoking-test-proves-reliable-for-predicting-abstinence-in-cancer-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240820/Simplified-smoking-test-proves-reliable-for-predicting-abstinence-in-cancer-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bafbf724-eff0-4c3a-b3a5-4a6692eb52a7 Tue, 20 Aug 2024 15:14:16 -0400 Simplified smoking test proves reliable for predicting abstinence in cancer patients
乙酰神经酸药物获批用于治疗 GNE 肌病患者为了治疗得不到充分治疗的罕见疾病患者群体，他们的肌肉逐渐变弱直至无法行走，日本各地的一组研究人员完成了一项临床研究，以确认长期服用治疗药物的安全性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240820/Aceneuramic-acid-drug-receives-approval-for-treatment-of-病人-with-GNE-myopathy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240820/Aceneuramic-acid-drug-receives-approval-for-treatment-of-病人-with-GNE-myopathy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f3bec80b-48ef-4d81-b6eb-4b5b96824f91 Tue, 20 Aug 2024 15:09:43 -0400 Aceneuramic acid drug receives approval for treatment of patients with GNE myopathy
精准医学通过基因分析增强前列腺癌治疗患有转移性去势抵抗性前列腺癌的男性应主要使用第二代激素药物治疗，与化疗相比，这种药物具有更好的治疗反应和更长的预期寿命。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240820/Precision-medicine-enhances-prostate-cancer-treatment-with-genic-profiling.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240820/Precision-medicine-enhances-prostate-cancer-treatment-with-genic-profiling.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a2735865-687d-4ec5-a190-7ee6d36e99a7 Tue, 20 Aug 2024 14:57:00 -0400 Precision medicine enhances prostate cancer treatment with genetic profiling
革命性的血小板评分为心脏病发作提供更好的风险评估血小板是循环细胞碎片，已知会聚集并形成血凝块，从而阻止受伤血管的出血。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240820/Revolutionary-platelet-score-offers-better-risk-assessment-for-heart-attacks.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240820/Revolutionary-platelet-score-offers-better-risk-assessment-for-heart-attacks.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ab0111bf-3f3f-4d34-b4d7-b98b93411672 Tue, 20 Aug 2024 14:29:19 -0400 Revolutionary platelet score offers better risk assessment for heart attacks
海洋蜗牛毒液可能会激发新的糖尿病和激素紊乱治疗方法科学家们正在一个意想不到的地方寻找治疗糖尿病和激素紊乱的线索：来自地球上最毒的动物之一的毒素。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240820/Marine-snail-venom-may-inspire-new-diabetes-and-hormone-disorder-treatments.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240820/Marine-snail-venom-may-inspire-new-diabetes-and-hormone-disorder-treatments.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7ae1ff64-98fc-4312-9274-82231782b602 Tue, 20 Aug 2024 14:13:44 -0400 Marine snail venom may inspire new diabetes and hormone disorder treatments
NIH 拨款 690 万美元用于为未来的临床试验准备潜在的阿尔茨海默病治疗方法由加州大学圣地亚哥分校 Carlo Ballatore 博士和宾夕法尼亚大学 Kurt Brunden 博士领导的多学科科学家团队获得了国家老龄化研究所 (NIA) 690 万美元的资助）为未来的临床试验准备一种潜在的缓解阿尔茨海默病疾病的疗法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240820/NIH-awards-2469-million-to-prepare-a-pottial-Alzheimers-treatment-for-future-clinical-trials.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240820/NIH-awards-2469-million-to-prepare-a-pottial-Alzheimers-treatment-for-future-clinical-trials.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d7e0bd7f-966e-4a3f-9920-d95e494f3220 Tue, 20 Aug 2024 14:00:48 -0400 NIH awards $6.9 million to prepare a potential Alzheimer's treatment for future clinical trials
尽管特朗普声称，哈里斯并未投票支持“削减医疗保险” 7月24日在北卡罗来纳州夏洛特举行的竞选集会上，前总统唐纳德·特朗普声称副总统卡马拉·哈里斯负责在美国参议院通过立法，将医疗保险支出削减近3000亿美元。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240820/Harris-did-not-vote-to-e28098cut-Medicaree28099-despite-Trumpe28099s-claim.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240820/Harris-did-not-vote-to-e28098cut-Medicaree28099-despite-Trumpe28099s-claim.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=acead36d-0517-401e-a16a-253b52193272 Tue, 20 Aug 2024 13:29:55 -0400 Harris did not vote to ‘cut Medicare,’ despite Trump’s claim
全球和地方采取行动对抗肝炎的努力在本次采访中，我们与全球消除肝炎联盟 (CGHE) 副主任 Lindsey Hiebert 和曼德拉·华盛顿研究员兼加纳 Sandema 医院医师助理 James Amugsi 探讨了全球和地方抗击病毒性肝炎的努力。他们共同为抗击肝炎的挑战、成功以及伙伴关系的重要性提供了宝贵的见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240820/Global-and-Local-Efforts-to-Take-Action-Against-Hepatitis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240820/Global-and-Local-Efforts-to-Take-Action-Against-Hepatitis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1c85d3b2-60f1-4db6-8cba-4fcaf1456b19 Tue, 20 Aug 2024 10:57:00 -0400 Global and Local Efforts to Take Action Against Hepatitis
